description: This task involves writing out a document which reviews different tools which can be leveraged to automate the process of writing API Docs. For Mifos X, Swagger has been used. With Mifos I/O which is based on a Microservice Architecture, explore the use of tools like Spring REST Docs to document APIs for Microservices. Synthesize your research into a Google Document and submit it here ( https://goo.gl/TuN7Bj ).
name: Document How To Document APIs On Mifos I/O Using Spring Restdocs
